code: import React from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import"./Card.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTripOptionCard=props=>{const{destination_id}=useParams();const addToTrip=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({trip_id:props.id,destination_id:destination_id})};fetch("/api/trips-destinations",options);window.location.href="/";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Card",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(props.img_url,")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:props.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:props.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addToTrip",onClick:addToTrip,children:"+ Add to Trip"})]})});};export default AddTripOptionCard;
